text:
Exercise: Build your frontend!
Step 1: Use the React CRUD cheat sheet to build JUST THE BASIC APP (“Welcome to React”)
Step 2: Use the React Authentication cheat sheet to get working Signup, Login, and Logout components (all on the Home page, do NOT worry about making multiple pages and routes)
Step 3: Use the React CRUD cheat sheet to build the remaining actions for your backend

elements.text:
Exercise: Build your frontend!
Step 1: Use the React CRUD cheat sheet to build JUST THE BASIC APP (“Welcome to React”)
Step 2: Use the React Authentication cheat sheet to get working Signup, Login, and Logout components (all on the Home page, do NOT worry about making multiple pages and routes)
